scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix client install
scripts.dev:win: start "server" cmd /c "npm --prefix server run dev" && timeout /t 2 >nul && start "client" cmd /c "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,magenta "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
